nl.inl.blacklab.search.indexmetadata

Interface IndexMetadata

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Freezable<IndexMetadata>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IndexMetadataImpl, MockIndexMetadata

    public interface IndexMetadata
extends Freezable<IndexMetadata>
    Information about a BlackLab index, including its fields structure.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default AnnotatedField annotatedField(String name) 
      AnnotatedFields annotatedFields() 
      boolean contentViewable()
      Is the content freely viewable by all users, or is it restricted?
      String description()
      Get a description of the index, if specified
      String displayName()
      Get the display name for the index.
      String documentFormat()
      What format(s) is/are the documents in? This is in the form of a format identifier as understood by the DocumentFormats class (either an abbreviation or a (qualified) class name).
      String indexBlackLabBuildTime()
      When was the BlackLab.jar used for indexing built?
      String indexBlackLabVersion()
      When was the BlackLab.jar used for indexing built?
      String indexFormat()
      What version of the index format is this?
      boolean isNewIndex()
      Is this a new, empty index? An empty index is one that doesn't have a main contents field yet, or has a main contents field but no indexed tokens yet.
      default AnnotatedField mainAnnotatedField() 
      default MetadataField metadataField(String name) 
      MetadataFields metadataFields() 
      default boolean subannotationsStoredWithParent() 
      TextDirection textDirection()
      What's the text direction of this corpus?
      String timeCreated()
      When was this index created?
      String timeModified()
      When was this index last modified?
      long tokenCount()
      How many tokens are in the index?

        String displayName()
        Get the display name for the index. If no display name was specified, returns the name of the index directory.
        Returns:
        the display name

        String description()
        Get a description of the index, if specified
        Returns:
        the description

      • contentViewable

        boolean contentViewable()
        Is the content freely viewable by all users, or is it restricted?
        Returns:
        true if the full content may be retrieved by anyone

      • textDirection

        TextDirection textDirection()
        What's the text direction of this corpus?
        Returns:
        text direction

      • documentFormat

        String documentFormat()
        What format(s) is/are the documents in? This is in the form of a format identifier as understood by the DocumentFormats class (either an abbreviation or a (qualified) class name).
        Returns:
        the document format(s)

      • indexFormat

        String indexFormat()
        What version of the index format is this?
        Returns:
        the index format version

      • indexBlackLabVersion

        String indexBlackLabVersion()
        When was the BlackLab.jar used for indexing built?
        Returns:
        date/time stamp

      • tokenCount

        long tokenCount()
        How many tokens are in the index?
        Returns:
        number of tokens

      • isNewIndex

        boolean isNewIndex()
        Is this a new, empty index? An empty index is one that doesn't have a main contents field yet, or has a main contents field but no indexed tokens yet.
        Returns:
        true if it is, false if not.
